net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns
Class FingerSlave

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglet.Aglet
      com.ibm.agletx.patterns.Slave
          net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns.FingerSlave
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FingerSlave
extends Slave

FingerSlave is a aglet of Slave pattern that moves to a remote site and backs to the original site with information.

Version:
1.00 96/12/28
Author:
Danny B. Lange, Yariv Aridor
